page.title: 09VILLAGE FACILITIES
page.content: The village has no surgery and patients must travel to Sleaford or Ruskington to visit a doctor. The village hall can accommodate 200 people and is used regularly for social functions, however it is not suitable for indoor sports. There is no public house, but there are licensed social clubs in the village. A mobile library visits the village for one hour every fortnight. The village has only two shops; a general-store/post office and a general-store/newsagent. The post office is conveniently located in the centre of the village. The other general-store is at the western end of the village on College Road.
